field.name: Give first dose of an appropriate antibiotic after completing assessment for:
If clouding of the cornea or pus draining from eye, apply tetracycline eye ointment
Have child look up and squirt a small amount of the ointment on the inside of the lower lid
Fill out referral form. Record clinical care in Child Health Record “green” book
What to do while waiting for transport to arrive:
Advise mother/caregiver not to carry the child on her back
Teach mother/caregiver how to keep the child warm on the way to the health facility
If child still breastfeeds, observe mother breastfeeding and provide counseling on breast attachment and positioning, if necessary
Counsel mother/caregiver on feeding a sick
Accompany mother and child to the health facility
Follow up with client after discharge from health center or hospital
